participant_1.name: Emily Johnson
participant_1.personality: Confident and ambitious, always striving for success.
participant_1.background: I plan to go to business school next year. I graduated from Yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. My parents are very wealthy bankers. I grew up in Manhattan.

participant_2.name: Jake Thompson
participant_2.personality: Friendly and laid-back, enjoys sharing stories and connecting with others.
participant_2.background: I am a convenience store manager. I've short brown hair. I drive a Nissan Pathfinder. My favorite music is country music. I met Taylor Swift.
